Name: Lasherria Robinson
Text: My experience was wonderful… I only got a wash and flat iron… but the wash was very relaxing, my hair was beautiful, and it was done in a timely fashion…

Name: Sapphire Fraser
Text:
I’ve been coming to ABC Beauty Academy for the past 5 years for haircuts and color and have left happy every time! The students are very attentive to your wants and are sure it’s what you want. An instructor signs off and approves every step so that they are executed flawlessly! Thank you for excellent service and prices.
